verses.verse: Then Joseph <WH3130> could <WH3201> not control <WH662> himself before all <WH3605> those who stood <WH5324> by him, and he cried, <WH7121> "Have everyone <WH3605> go <WH3318> out from me." So there was no <WH3808> man <WH376> with him when Joseph <WH3130> made <WH3045> himself known <WH3045> to his brothers. <WH251>
And he wept <WH5414> <WH6963> <WH1065> so loudly <WH6963> that the Egyptians <WH4714> heard <WH8085> [it], and the household <WH1004> of Pharaoh <WH6547> heard <WH8085> [of it].

Then Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to his brothers, <WH251> "I am Joseph! <WH3130> Is my father still <WH1> alive <WH5750>?" But his brothers <WH2416> could <WH251> not answer <WH3201> him, for they were dismayed <WH6030> at his presence. <WH926>

Then Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to his brothers, <WH251> "Please <WH4994> come <WH5066> closer <WH5066> to me." And they came <WH5066> closer. <WH5066> And he said, <WH559> "I am your brother <WH251> Joseph, <WH3130> whom <WH834> you sold <WH4376> into Egypt. <WH4714>

"And now <WH6258> do not be grieved <WH6087> or angry <WH2734> with yourselves, <WH5869> because <WH3588> you sold <WH4376> me here; <WH2008> for God <WH430> sent <WH7971> me before <WH6440> you to preserve <WH4241> life. <WH4241>

"For the famine <WH7458> [has been] in the land <WH776> these <WH2088> two years, <WH8141> and there are still <WH5750> five <WH2568> years <WH8141> in which <WH834> there <WH369> will be neither <WH369> plowing <WH2758> nor <WH369> harvesting. <WH7105>

"And God <WH430> sent <WH7971> me before <WH6440> you to preserve <WH7760> for you a remnant <WH7611> in the earth, <WH776> and to keep <WH2421> you alive <WH2421> by a great <WH1419> deliverance. <WH6413>

"Now, <WH6258> therefore, it was not you who sent <WH7971> me here, <WH2008> but God; <WH430> and He has made <WH7760> me a father to Pharaoh <WH1> and lord <WH6547> of all <WH113> his household <WH3605> and ruler <WH1004> over all <WH4910> the land <WH3605> of Egypt. <WH776>

"Hurry <WH4116> and go <WH5927> up to my father, and say <WH1> to him, 'Thus <WH559> says <WH3541> your son <WH559> Joseph, <WH1121> "God <WH3130> has made <WH430> me lord <WH7760> of all <WH113> Egypt; <WH3605> come <WH4714> down <WH3381> to me, do not delay. <WH3381>

"And you shall live <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Goshen, <WH1657> and you shall be near <WH7138> me, you and your children <WH1121> and your children <WH1121>'s children and your flocks <WH6629> and your herds <WH1241> and all <WH3605> that you have.

"There <WH8033> I will also provide <WH3557> for you, for there are still <WH5750> five <WH2568> years <WH8141> of famine <WH7458> [to come], lest <WH6435> you and your household <WH1004> and all <WH3605> that you have be impoverished. <WH3423>"'
"And behold, <WH2009> your eyes <WH5869> see, <WH7200> and the eyes <WH5869> of my brother <WH251> Benjamin <WH1144> [see], that it is my mouth <WH6310> which is speaking <WH1696> to you.

"Now you must tell <WH5046> my father of all <WH1> my splendor <WH3605> in Egypt, <WH9202> and all <WH4714> that you have seen; <WH3605> and you must hurry <WH7200> and bring <WH4116> my father down <WH3381> here. <WH1>"
Then he fell <WH5307> on his brother <WH251> Benjamin <WH1144>'s neck <WH6677> and wept; <WH1058> and Benjamin wept <WH1058> on his neck. <WH6677>
And he kissed <WH5401> all <WH3605> his brothers <WH251> and wept <WH1058> on them, and afterward <WH310> <WH3651> his brothers <WH251> talked <WH1696> with him.
Now when the news <WH6963> was heard <WH8085> in Pharaoh <WH6547>'s house <WH1004> that Joseph's brothers <WH251> had come, <WH935> it pleased <WH3190> <WH5869> Pharaoh and his servants. <WH5650>

Then Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> to Joseph, <WH3130> "Say <WH559> to your brothers, <WH251> 'Do <WH6213> this: <WH2088> load <WH2943> your beasts <WH1165> and go <WH1980> <WH935> to the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667>

and take <WH3947> your father and your households <WH1> and come <WH1004> to me, and I will give <WH935> you the best <WH5414> of the land <WH2898> of Egypt <WH776> and you shall eat <WH4714> the fat <WH398> of the land. <WH2459>'

"Now you are ordered, <WH6680> 'Do <WH6213> this: <WH2088> take <WH3947> wagons <WH5699> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> for your little <WH2945> ones <WH2945> and for your wives, <WH802> and bring <WH5375> your father and come. <WH1>
'And do not concern <WH2347> <WH5869> yourselves <WH5869> with your goods, <WH3627> for the best <WH2898> of all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> is yours.' "

Then the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> so; <WH3651> and Joseph <WH3130> gave <WH5414> them wagons <WH5699> according <WH5921> to the command <WH6310> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> and gave <WH5414> them provisions <WH6720> for the journey. <WH1870>

To each <WH3605> <WH376> of them he gave <WH5414> changes <WH2487> of garments, <WH8071> but to Benjamin <WH1144> he gave <WH5414> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> [pieces of] silver <WH3701> and five <WH2568> changes <WH2487> of garments. <WH8071>

And to his father he sent <WH1> as follows: <WH7971> ten <WH2088> donkeys <WH6235> loaded <WH2543> with the best <WH5375> things <WH2898> of Egypt, <WH2898> and ten <WH4714> female <WH6235> donkeys <WH860> loaded <WH860> with grain <WH5375> and bread <WH1250> and sustenance <WH3899> for his father on the journey. <WH4202>
So he sent <WH7971> his brothers <WH251> away, <WH7971> and as they departed, <WH1980> he said <WH559> to them, "Do not quarrel <WH7264> on the journey. <WH1870>"
Then they went <WH5927> up from Egypt, <WH4714> and came <WH935> to the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> to their father Jacob. <WH1>

And they told <WH5046> him, saying, <WH559> "Joseph <WH3130> is still <WH5750> alive, <WH2416> and indeed <WH3588> he is ruler <WH4910> over all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>" But he was stunned, <WH6313> for he did not believe <WH539> them.

When they told <WH1696> him all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of Joseph <WH3130> that he had spoken <WH1696> to them, and when he saw <WH7200> the wagons <WH5699> that Joseph <WH3130> had sent <WH7971> to carry <WH5375> him, the spirit <WH7307> of their father Jacob <WH1> revived. <WH3290>
Then Israel <WH3478> said, <WH559> "It is enough; <WH7227> my son <WH1121> Joseph <WH3130> is still <WH5750> alive. <WH2416> I will go <WH1980> and see <WH7200> him before <WH2962> I die. <WH4191>"
